targets.query:
from(bucket: "RRI")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TestiranjeAktuatorja_13092024")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PresaStevec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

data1 = from(bucket: "RRI")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fromS7_mqtt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rt1_ch2" or r["_field"] == "rtd1_ch0" or r["_field"] == "rtd1_ch1" or r["_field"] == "rtd1_ch3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

data2 = from(bucket: "RRI")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TestiranjeAktuatorja_13092024")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Temperatura okolice" or r["_field"] == "Temperatura orodja 1" or r["_field"] == "Temperatura orodja 2" or r["_field"] == "Rezerva" or r["_field"] == "Temperatura okolice RTD" or  r["_field"] == "Egasi_Temperatura" or  r["_field"] == "Temperatura ohisje aktuator RTD"  or  r["_field"] == "Temperatura orodja RTD")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

union(tables: [data1, data2])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "RRI")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TestiranjeAktuatorja_13092024")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PresaHitrost")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

data1 = from(bucket: "RRI")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "M1_temp" or r["_field"] == "M2_temp" or r["_field"] == "M3_temp" or r["_field"] == "M4_temp" or r["_field"] == "M5_temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
